snippet: Think of the hundreds of baby-centric apps as sophisticated tactile toys for the 21st century. Here are some that can entertain or educate a child as young as 3 months.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights some baby-centric apps that can entertain or educate a child as young as 3 months.
lead_paragraph: Think of the hundreds of baby-centric apps as sophisticated tactile toys for the 21st century. Here are some that can entertain or educate a child as young as 3 months.

headline.print_headline: For a Baby, Mobile Screens to Shake and Rattle
headline.seo: Sparkabilities Babies 1 HD, Talking Tom Cat and Other Apps for Babies - App Smart
headline.main: For a Baby, Mobile Screens to Shake and Rattle
